name: Gladiator Beasts
author: Shredded
notes:
MVP and biggest brick was AMA, it single handely won me numerous games, and lost me due to brick, although I would keep it in, with gb you need to tag in and out and ama just gives you free pops.
Windstorm/Anubis were really good for defense on the mirror and vs hazy
Mind scan even after nerf is very good, it makes you play around back row and I didn't brick as nearly as I thought would
Lost like 5 games all up from L1-KOG ( I know its late season but couldnt be bothered to deal with bamboo)
